    • addStaircase

      public void addStaircase​(Room downRoom, Room upRoom, int i, int j) throws NonEmptyTileException
      Add a staircase between two rooms at given XY position
      Parameters:
      downRoom - : room to build the lower part of the staircase
      upRoom - : room to build the upper part of the staircase
      i - : X-coordinate of the tile with staircase in the two rooms.
      j - : Y-coordinate of the tile with staircase in the two rooms.
      Throws:
      NonEmptyTileException

    • build

      Build the basic dungeon with three rooms and one staircase between Room 0 and 1.

      Create a n*n room in the builder
      Specified by:
      createRoom in interface DungeonBuilder
      Parameters:
      roomDim - : with of the room = length
      level - : Z-coordinate of the room in the dungeon
      Throws:
      NonEmptyTileException
